about_the_game:
This giant kitten with a flying small kitten is cute and adorable. Yes. It is lovely giant kitten.

[Contents]

It contains all of the following permanent items:

* Wafting Giant Kitten
- Waft with giant kitten. Your partner will sit beside of you.

* Buoyant Kitten
- Not only giant kitten, small buoyant kitten will be with you!

* 50000 Beat
- Beat is one of in-game currencies that can be used in various ways such as buying in-game items.

[Note]

1. You can view the DLC which you buy at in-game DLC page (Click “View My Information” > Click a down arrow button at the bottom left of the information page(diary)).
2. The pack is delivered to your inbox when you click a "Not Received" button at in-game DLC page above.
3. Items are deleted without any prior notice if you don't receive them from your inbox in their retention period.
detailed_description:
This giant kitten with a flying small kitten is cute and adorable. Yes. It is lovely giant kitten.

[Contents]

It contains all of the following permanent items:

* Wafting Giant Kitten
- Waft with giant kitten. Your partner will sit beside of you.

* Buoyant Kitten
- Not only giant kitten, small buoyant kitten will be with you!

* 50000 Beat
- Beat is one of in-game currencies that can be used in various ways such as buying in-game items.

[Note]

1. You can view the DLC which you buy at in-game DLC page (Click “View My Information” > Click a down arrow button at the bottom left of the information page(diary)).
2. The pack is delivered to your inbox when you click a "Not Received" button at in-game DLC page above.
3. Items are deleted without any prior notice if you don't receive them from your inbox in their retention period.

name: LoveBeat - Giant Kitten Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or Newer version.
  • Processor: Pentium4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6600 GT, Radeon X1600 Pro
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer version
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT, Radeon X1800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
